お暑うございます: (おあつうございます) - it is warm (very polite)
お暑うご座います: (おあつうございます) - it is warm (very polite)
お替り: (おかわり) - second helping/another cup/seconds; command to have dog place its second paw in one's hand
お替わり: (おかわり) - second helping/another cup/seconds; command to have dog place its second paw in one's hand
お札: (おふだ) - type of household amulet or talisman, issued by a Shinto shrine, hung in the house for protection
お株を奪う: (おかぶをうばう) - to beat someone at his own game
お楽しみ: (おたのしみ) - enjoyment; pleasure; diversion; amusement; hobby
お構いなく: (おかまいなく) - please don't fuss over me
お構いなし: (おかまいなし) - unmindful/without care for others/inconsiderate/unconcerned; disregarding/overlooking
お構い無し: (おかまいなし) - unmindful/without care for others/inconsiderate/unconcerned; disregarding/overlooking
お櫃: (おひつ) - round, wooden container for cooked rice
お欠き: (おかき) - mochi cut thin, dried, and baked or fried
お次: (おつぎ) - next/next person; (from お次の間) room adjoining a noble's parlor
お正月: (おしょうがつ) - New Year (esp. first three or fifteen days); the first month of the year/January
お歯黒: (おはぐろ) - (おはぐろ only) tooth blackening; tooth-blackening dye
お歳暮: (おせいぼ) - end of the year; year-end gift
お歴々: (おれきれき) - dignitaries; very important persons; VIPs
お歴歴: (おれきれき) - dignitaries; very important persons; VIPs
お段: (おだん) - row of syllables on the Japanese syllabary table that ends with the vowel sound "o"
お気に入り: (おきにいり) - favorite/favourite/pet (e.g. teacher's pet); bookmark (in web browser)
お気に召す: (おきにめす) - to like; to prefer; to be pleased by
お気の毒に: (おきのどくに) - my sympathies; that's too bad; my condolences
お気を確かに: (おきをたしかに) - Don't do anything rash!; Keep composed!
お水取り: (おみずとり) - water-drawing ceremony (Toudaiji); rite of drawing sacred water
お決まり: (おきまり) - standard; set; routine; regular; usual; conventional; stereotyped; same old
お決り: (おきまり) - standard; set; routine; regular; usual; conventional; stereotyped; same old
お河童: (オカッパ) - (from resemblance to the mythical kappa's hair style)  bobbed hair
お泊まり保育: (おとまりほいく) - nursery school sleepover; one night sleepover at school in summer vacation of last year of nursery school
お泊り保育: (おとまりほいく) - nursery school sleepover; one night sleepover at school in summer vacation of last year of nursery school
お洒落: (オシャレ) - smartly dressed/stylish/fashion-conscious; someone smartly dressed; to dress up/to be fashionable
お浸し: (おしたし) - boiled greens in bonito-flavoured soy sauce (vegetable side dish)
お涙頂戴: (おなみだちょうだい) - (yoji) tearjerker; sob story; maudlin tale
お淑やか: (おしとやか) - graceful; ladylike; modest; gentle; polite; quiet; well-mannered; refined (behavior)
お清まし: (おすまし) - (お澄まし, お清まし, 御澄まし, 御清まし only)  primness/prim person; clear soup
お清汁: (おすまし) - (お澄まし, お清まし, 御澄まし, 御清まし only)  primness/prim person; clear soup
お澄まし: (おすまし) - (お澄まし, お清まし, 御澄まし, 御清まし only)  primness/prim person; clear soup
お火焚: (おほたき) - Kyoto area festival held on the 11th lunar month (wherein bonfires are burned at shrines)
お灸を据える: (おきゅうをすえる) - to rake over the coals/to scold/to chastise/to roast; to burn moxa on the skin
お点前: (おてまえ) - skill/dexterity/artistry/ingenuity; etiquette of tea-ceremony
お為ごかし: (おためごかし) - self-aggrandizement under pretense of aiding another (aggrandisement, pretence)
お焦げ: (おこげ) - burnt rice; scorched rice; crispy rice at bottom of cooking pan
お熱: (おねつ) - having a crush on someone; flushing
お父さん: (おとっさん) - father; dad; papa; pa; pop; daddy; dada
お父さん子: (おとうさんこ) - daddy's girl; daddy's boy; child strongly attached to its father
お父ちゃん: (おとうちゃん) - dad; dada; daddy; pa; papa; pappa; pop
お爺さん: (おじいさん) - (usu. お祖父さん)  grandfather; (usu. お爺さん) male senior-citizen
お猪口: (おちょこ) - small cup/sake cup; cup-shaped
お玉杓子: (オタマジャクシ) - (お玉杓子, 御玉杓子 only) ladle; tadpole; musical note
お生憎さま: (おあいにくさま) - that's too bad (ironical); unfortunate person (often a gleeful "too bad for you!")
お生憎様: (おあいにくさま) - that's too bad (ironical); unfortunate person (often a gleeful "too bad for you!")
お田植え祭: (おたうえまつり) - shrine ritual held with the first two months of the year to forecast (or pray for) a successful harvest; seasonal planting of rice on a field affiliated with a shrine
お田植え祭り: (おたうえまつり) - shrine ritual held with the first two months of the year to forecast (or pray for) a successful harvest; seasonal planting of rice on a field affiliated with a shrine
お留守になる: (おるすになる) - to fail to be attentive to
お番菜: (おばんざい) - light Kyoto-style home cooking with boiled vegetables and marinated food, also now served in restaurants
お疲れさま: (おつかれさま) - thank you/many thanks/much appreciated; that's enough for today
お疲れ様: (おつかれさま) - thank you/many thanks/much appreciated; that's enough for today
お白州: (おしらす) - court of law in the Edo period, in which the parties sat on white sand
お百度: (おひゃくど) - hundred times worship (e.g. walking back and forth a hundred times before a shrine offering a prayer each time)
お百度を踏む: (おひゃくどをふむ) - to visit repeatedly (to request)
お盆: (おぼん) - O-Bon/Bon Festival/Lantern Festival/Festival of the Dead; tray
お目にかかる: (おめにかかる) - to meet (someone of higher status); to be recognized (esp. by someone of higher status)/to be visible/to be seen/to be noticed
お目にとまる: (おめにとまる) - to be recognized (by someone of higher status); to be noticed; to get attention
お目に掛かる: (おめにかかる) - to meet (someone of higher status); to be recognized (esp. by someone of higher status)/to be visible/to be seen/to be noticed
お目に留まる: (おめにとまる) - to be recognized (by someone of higher status); to be noticed; to get attention
お目もじ: (おめもじ) - personal meeting (esp. used by females)
お目出度う: (おめでとう) - congratulations!; an auspicious occasion!
